Course_Detail: Post Graduate Diploma in Criminal Law is one year's (2 Semesters) program offered by Himalayan University, Itanagar. This prolific postgraduate diploma in criminal law will help law graduates in building progressive and bright careers in the field of the criminal justice system. The study-areas included in this one-year program are criminology and penology; Indian Penal Code; criminal procedure code and the law of evidence; forensic science; psychological, criminological, and sociological aspects of crimes; and emerging developments in criminal justice. Course_Detail: Post Graduate Diploma in Taxation is one year's (2 Semesters) program offered by Himalayan University, Itanagar. This postgraduate diploma program in cyber law can undoubtedly be very useful to law-graduates who are deeply interested in building booming careers in the field of cyber business and justice. After completion of this PG diploma course, they will find illustrious employments in private law firms, IT industry, and all those companies and firms engaged in making use of computer or internet. This one-year program encompasses the topics of cyberspace and Information & Communications Technology (ICT); laws and entities governing cyberspace; electronic contracts; e-commerce and taxation; privacy and data protection; dispute resolution in cyberspace; cyber crimes & torts; protection of IPR in cyberspace; and social issues in regulation of c

Course_Detail: Post Graduate Human Rights Law in Taxation is one year's (2 Semesters) program offered by Himalayan University, Itanagar. This postgraduate diploma course in human rights is specially designed for law graduates, but this can be very helpful also to graduates in various professional, commercial, or service disciplines.
